website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, affordable, reliable upgrade switch. Noticeable clicking sound when operating, however.
cons: Switch has a noticeable click when pressed

customer_reviews.title: The label adhesive cannot be removed by mortals
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be an OK switch, BUT the manufacturer attaches their label across the rocker face. Once you peel off the paper portion of the label, you will be faced with the finest adhesive known to man. It will laugh at your meager attempts to remove the residue with something as mundane as Goof-Off. Neither is it phased by acetone, mineral spirits, or Shell's finest 87 octane gasoline! You will spend FAR more time trying to remove the adhesive than installing the switch. You will finally be faced with bitter defeat and install it with sticky residue to always remind you that you are not the infallible craftsman that you thought you were.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging: adhesive label is placed on the switch itself, requires goo remover!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible packaging: adhesive label with product part number and description is placed on the switch itself, which leaves glue residue on the switch and requires Goo remover to be applied before you can install the switch (see photo with 3 switches, before, during and after). The switch itself is very good but I can't recommend a product that needs such preparation compared to a couple dozen other Decora Leviton switches that take a minute each to unpackage and install.
customer_reviews.author: LeoG49

customer_reviews.title: Yaaassss 👏 👏
customer_reviews.text: SHAARRPPP LOOKINNN! Upgraded from mid 70s toggles, and these look sweet. Idk why anyone complains about the click, I don't notice it at all lol. Also, happy there are no stickers so the manufacturer fixed that complaint for sure. They come in individual boxes in a bigger box so no scratches, all lovely. Went in easy, and such a small upgrade making a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: SrvivlKittsn

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DESCRIBED INCORRECTLY AND DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Switch was described as “Quiet “ model but is just the basic 3-way switch. After receiving switch and trying to explain it was wrong product , but advised by Amazon that it was correct model, I checked manufacturer’s product lists. Model 5603-2WM is the basic 3-way switch. Model 5693-2W is the upgraded self grounding quiet switch. This product’s listing has basic model# but description is for upgraded quiet switch. I was specifically looking for a quiet switch and would not have purchased if listing was accurate. Also, 2 of the 10 switches I received had numerous scratches on front which were not the result of shipping. Appear to have been returned and / or used based on volume of scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Gunky sticker on front hard to remove. Switch is fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine switch, but as purchased from Amazon.com (not third party seller), the switch had a white sticker on the face of the switch that left a very hard to remove residue when removed. This seemed to have been put on the switch after it came from the manufacturer (it was not in original manufacturer box). Other sellers probably don't have this issue. Once the sticker and adhesive was removed, the switch itself is totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Golde

customer_reviews.title: 1 usable switch out of 20
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 packs of 5. Apparantly they are a switches out of their boxes thrown into a bag 5 each. All but only ONE is unusable and scratched completely up. Blown away by the packaging stupidity on this one..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes hate leaving great reviews because I feel like when the seller sees this they will increase their price. (and then when I need more, I will end up paying more because I gave them a rave review). I was questioning this - but they are great and work perfect for my very high detailed electrical layout and project!
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Deep gouges all over-unusable condition
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the 5 switches arrived deeply gouged all over the front. It is not possible to install a switch in such a condition. It is not shipping damage, it should never have been allowed to be shipped to a customer in that condition. None of my 68 year old original switches in my house look as bad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging caused the product to be delighted with large scratches.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product (5 pack) one of them was severely scratched. I requested a replacement and sure enough tree of them were scratched up as well. The switches come loose in a bag, not individually boxed or even in a bulk box. You're experience may be different if you order a single switch or a 10 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Switch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this switch to convert a space with two light switches into an area with three paddle switches (this one and a dual). This switch is fairly easy to use if you have some experience with running electrical. I bought this cause my local big box does not carry Ivory for some reason. I was trying to match our dimmer switches that are new by. This color worked great and I will get another if I need to do a similar job any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: comicsvenom2002

customer_reviews.title: Good buy on the 5 pack
customer_reviews.text: Good buy on the 5 pack. Single switch was selling for $6 and I received 5 for $12. My switches were purchased directly from Amazon.com and came in a retail box with no stickers on the switches like other reviewers were mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: 15 Year MemberTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No stickers on switches
customer_reviews.text: These (Leviton 5603-2W 15 Amp) came 10 per sealed box and provide both a push-in and screw-down wire connection. Solid toggle with audible click. Exactly as my current switches.
customer_reviews.author: MagnoliaTexas

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than the big box store and no packaging. They looked like they traveled - not scratched badly but definitely not brand new. Also aren’t the quiet switches as other reviewers noted. If it wasn’t such a hassle to return I wouldn’t have kept them
customer_reviews.author: J. Mesick

customer_reviews.title: Now my house is uniform
customer_reviews.text: The stupid builder I used put in Decora switches wherever we had electrical work done. As a result, half the house was Decora and half was traditional toggle switches. Now the house is uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Color doesnt fade, works well, have 5 installed with no problems.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these in the past and have had 0 problems. Reliable, built well, and the color doesnt fade over time. I have 5 of these in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I only had one spot left in my house with standard switches instead of rocker switches, and that was the laundry / mud room. So I needed a 3 way switch to replace them. These arrived as advertised, nice solid construction. Great solid feel to the switch movement. Push connectors for the wires of course, with the screws if you want them instead, just like the rest. The swap out was a piece of cake, and these went right in the box without any issues. Work like a charm, got them at a great price, and really makes the room look better with these instead of the old fashioned switches.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDadTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Really works well, I have used other brands and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really works well, I have used other brands and this one is the easiest to install. I do wish they would include a separate wiring diagram sheet, the pre-printed one on on the box tab is very difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Nice switches
customer_reviews.text: I changed out all the switches in my home and they look great. These were very easy to switch out and now my house looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Schaumburg

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, easy to install, look and work great. Good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Quick connect is a great feature. High quality and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: S.Wells

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Needed new rockers for various rooms for replacements. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Loring C. Mercil

customer_reviews.title: Great color for use in and around stainless.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to find these switches in gray to match our stainless steel backsplash. Good quality, reasonable price and good looks (over the blaring white or boring almond). Highly recommended if you need something other than whites.
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging: adhesive label is hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: The items came just by simple plastic. And the label on the switch is hard to remove. Never gave any bad feedback on amazon before. The seller is the Leviton. The stuff hurt the brand.
customer_reviews.author: SheldonShao

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this switch to replace a standard toggle switch because of my plate configuration. The location was going to have to two decorative style switches (one timer and one lighted) and one standard toggle and I knew I would be hard pressed to find a plate with two large square openings and one toggle switch opening. So I replaced the toggle switch with this switch so that I would have three decorative style switches which is easy to find a matching plate.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarMan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality light switches
customer_reviews.text: operated exactly as expected. Good quality light switches. Finally replaced my traditional switches with the rocker type. Call me a weirdo, but i love rocker switches compared to normal switches. These really fit the bill and look/operate great.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Nice switches.
customer_reviews.text: These are quite nice and I have now replaced all of my switches in the house. So far so good. No failures and they are like the "old" style toggle in terms of easy to install. Really suggest you turn of the breaker so you don't get zapped!!! They work well with the Decora screwless plates.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: The on/off click is a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the same style ones I had but they had a night light glow to them. They wouldn't work with led light bulbs unless they were the dimming type from what I read. These do have a louder click to them then the ones I did have, it's not a deal buster but if your trying to be quiet you can forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: sandibeaches5

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these in white for my hallway when I received it one of the switches were grey. The box is clearly grey!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mattos

customer_reviews.title: These are advertised as quiet, but they have a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as quiet, but they have a noticeable click, so they are not really as quiet (nearly silent) as other decor switches I have purchased elsewhere. Otherwise I have no further comments.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Chenier

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be quiet, they aren’t
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as quiet switches & they are anything but quiet. Loud click when thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet at all, looked used
customer_reviews.text: These are not quiet at all. They make a loud clicking noise. And they were scratched, scuffed, looked used. Disappointing. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Blue11

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this item twice first time great each item came in their own bags
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item twice first time great each item came in their own bags. Really want to give 2.5 stars because extremely satisfied first time second time annoyed as f&$@. Some moron decided two use these retarded stickers instead of packaging them properly. So the glue is so imbedded can't get it off even with a razor blade digs into plastic. So used alcohol still not coming off, so moved on to goof off and that actually etched the plastic so I screwed it up hard to tell in the pic but you can see around the edges but glue came off. So if you get these with stickers return them. Don't mess with it you'll just damage the switches.
customer_reviews.author: Egb

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty switch.
customer_reviews.text: A basic light duty switch. they seem to be of good quality and I haven't had any problems with them. These come in several different colors, so be sure to verify which one you are ordering before you finalize your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install! Looks great from the old hand-switch. The stainless steel face plates we bough for it fit perfectly! Slightly more expensive than if I were to buy it in the store, but I ordered for convenience since we were finishing out our room.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene Simons

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, have stickers that leave residue on switch
customer_reviews.text: They put these horrible stickers on the switch itself that leave residue behind when peeled. Then you have to spend forever removing it, or just have your new switch look like trash.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: YEAH
customer_reviews.text: Item is made in grey and can continue in my upgrade remodeling guest bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Lona Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Not 3-way
customer_reviews.text: Not a 3-way switch as advertised. Was looking for switch to control blinds. This is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayko Patello

customer_reviews.title: Switch faces were smudged and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why someone would toss plastic and metal switches "loosely" in a bag. Switches are dirty but more important ly, the faces of the the switches are scratched. Doing my best to clean and buff them out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SEbby

customer_reviews.title: Click, lights go on. Click, lights go off.
customer_reviews.text: Good switch. What can I say, it's a good and reliable switch. I can never seem to find the style or design I want at the big-boxes (or even some of the smaller boxes) scattered all around town. This is exactly want I wanted at an affordable price and from a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a great option to move away from the standard white/almond switches. As more and more shading of gray are used in peoples homes, this is a very timely option. Hoping for an even lighter grey shade to come. Put these throughout one client's home - they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha N.

customer_reviews.title: Has Leviton embossed on switch faces
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up I asked in the questions if these had “LEVITON” embossed on the switch faces and got 3 people that replied saying no. These DO have Leviton embossed on the face of the switches on the bottom left hand corner, so if this bothers you do not purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin Sarathy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install, this was a replacement to a traditional style switch and wired exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Just installed, works good
customer_reviews.text: Just put these in 9/5/2020, so far so good, color matched well with screwless wall plates
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: Nice 15a switch
customer_reviews.text: Order the correct product and you won't be disappointed. Product does what it should and switches easily.
customer_reviews.author: ECS

customer_reviews.title: Rocks nicely, easy install and perfectly worked with the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Rocks nicely, easy install and perfectly worked with the other switches this one is in series with another three way switch and a four way, powering a led light fixture as well as a recessed led light No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: CalibratedZeus

customer_reviews.title: make sure you have some solvent on hand (and let the thing dry before you connect power!)
customer_reviews.text: I bought from Amazon llc. switch seems fine, but a large gooey price tag was slapped on the front. cleaning off that sticky mess adds time to my project and seems careless and unnecessary from the seller. put the sticker literally anywhere else and it wouldn't show after install.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R Christensen

customer_reviews.title: This ones ok
customer_reviews.text: This switch worked great. I wanted to do the whole project without a trip to the hardware store but the single pole switch they sent me was all jacked up, same brand and everything.
customer_reviews.author: VinceF

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with oil rubbed bronze covers and they look beautiful together. Most of our light switchers are rockers similar in style so these help carry the look through the house. Install was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a switch and it works
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just needed a single pole switch, but this double pole switch worked just fine
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leviton is one of the best brands Amazon has fair prices
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: Works great and much cheaper than the big box!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Same ones as what I could have bought at the big box store at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to us a low quality for the price we paid - Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: esalomo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fine -- though make sure your colors match (Leviton seems to have some issue with mislabeling white/ivory...)
customer_reviews.author: - Taz -

customer_reviews.title: Nice Switch
customer_reviews.text: Works Great and less expensive than the Big Orange Box where I normally purchase such stuff.
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: Nice switch
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I wish they wouldn't put a big sticker right on switch. Even after using wallpaper remover there is still adhesive on it.
customer_reviews.author: chad mccartney

customer_reviews.title: Switch did the job and looks great. Others are right
customer_reviews.text: Switch did the job and looks great. Others are right, nothing quiet about it. Really a minor issue considering my house is fraught with relay clicks and water valve hissing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like New? Ha!
customer_reviews.text: Too many surface scratches to be considered “Like new” on half of the switches.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not original leviton product
customer_reviews.text: The switches did not come in original leviton package. I don't think its original leviton prodoct. Also the switches do not seem to be new, there were scratches and dark spots. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Debashis Roy

customer_reviews.title: Not a pure white
customer_reviews.text: These are not a pure white, don’t match pure white plates or other switches. Even the dog can see
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in two years
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this 3-way switch. It has stopped working after 2-years. I expected it to work a long time like all the other switches in the house.
customer_reviews.author: lawnmowerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice switch .. Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time .. Good Quality. Easy to install. Works for 3 way setup Look great and feel great too. Have to buy plates separately but no big deal. Home depot carries same line (more pricey) and also the plates to cover
customer_reviews.author: Strongman

customer_reviews.title: Loud and sticky
customer_reviews.text: This switch came with a sticker that left adhesive, I could not remove, on the entire front. I used alcohol and cleaner and finally used sand paper. Also, this switch is far from quiet. It makes an impressively loud click when pressed on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Giffen

customer_reviews.title: Best three way switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great three way switch. It includes a grounding switch and the screws to attach to the box. It is easy to wire, well labeled and the packaging (plastic bags) is easy to open - which matters when you are doing dozens of these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Decent price for a reputable brand. I can get ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for a reputable brand. I can get Cooper switches at the local hardware store for a bit cheaper, but I would take the Leviton quality over Cooper any day.
customer_reviews.author: krisr2005

customer_reviews.title: leviton 3 way light switch
customer_reviews.text: Nice switches I have all through my home, easily installed nice quiet switch.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny S

customer_reviews.title: Great value + Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, and significantly cheaper than buying them at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it looks good and no problem to install by self home maintentance guy
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.K.

customer_reviews.title: Have worked flawlessly for years.
customer_reviews.text: Have dozens of these in my home, all work flawlessly. Had to replace one that was a timer by another manufacturer. Easy to install. Attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Fair and Balanced

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and look
customer_reviews.text: Replaced every switch in the house. Very easy to install and look great
customer_reviews.author: thomas seastrunk

customer_reviews.title: My first DO NOT BUY review
customer_reviews.text: Dead after 3 months with very light use. Plus, it is true that the sticker leaves adhesive on the switch that is very hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Metehan Karabiber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Got to replace old rocker switch. Easy to install, looks nice
customer_reviews.author: CWood

customer_reviews.title: Works.... Not much more to say.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Typical rocker switch. Little cheap feeling and louder than expected, overall though, for the price, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value, quality construction, looks great and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: zee808

customer_reviews.title: The switch is fine, the stocking tag glued to the front is ...
customer_reviews.text: The switch is fine, the stocking tag glued to the front is not. It took 10 min to clean each one.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing that they put the hard to remove product sticker ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing that they put the hard to remove product sticker on the front of the switch. Otherwise, it's exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest quality but they are good for what you pay for them
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Not the highest quality but they are good for what you pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Orderd a 5 pack and only received one, false advertising or someone can’t count to 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did get 3way switches. No instructions. These were not quiet at all per the title.
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: Great addition.
customer_reviews.text: Thought the idea was great and needed to change the old switch because of a short.
customer_reviews.author: NewRider2012

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks good and work great. (works on 3 way)
customer_reviews.author: Howard James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: RoscoeKoopa151

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Item worked perfectly. I love buying these on Amazon...so much less expensive than at the box stores.
customer_reviews.author: STACY M. JACOB

customer_reviews.title: Correct color
customer_reviews.text: I thouht I ordered a White switch but a gray switch came.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than at hardware store but just as good
customer_reviews.text: This switch installed easily and works perfectly. We've had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: fortherelax

customer_reviews.title: grade can be counted on for years of good service.
customer_reviews.text: Leviton Products, especially the spec, grade can be counted on for years of good service.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Rockers through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. This was a trial situation for me. First, I ordered two, one ivory and one almond to see what would look best on my wall. Almond was a great blend for my existing paint. Ivory was a slant to a yellowed beige. Then, I was interested in a quieter than existing switch outlet. Didn't happen, so I won't be using these. My engineering husband says the regular switches are easier to repair anyway. If you are just determined to use rockers, Amazon has the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The surface of these are not smooth. You can see ridges coming through from behind. They look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I spent some time trying to avoid the audible "click" and these were the answer, the operate smooth and are very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr X

customer_reviews.title: Switch is fine, packaging not so much
customer_reviews.text: Switch is fine, packaging not so much. Buy some goo gone, the sticker on the face of the switch does not come off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Steinblock

customer_reviews.title: best buy
customer_reviews.text: this item came quickly and cost a lot less than the box stores i keep a bunch on hand now just in case at this price why not?
customer_reviews.author: Rossy

customer_reviews.title: 3-way switches
customer_reviews.text: Good quality brand, very good price. Just what I wanted. Needed to finish projects around house. Need cover plates now!
customer_reviews.author: Big Yash

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I cant return when it is an unused product
customer_reviews.author: Deana Arnette-Maze

customer_reviews.title: These do NOT come with faceplates
customer_reviews.text: We just had these switches professionally installed, and they work as expected. They produce an audible click, somewhere around the level of snapping my fingers, but do seem a bit quieter and easier to push than varieties normally available where I am. As the title of this review states, despite what the picture shows, the price does not include the faceplate! Also, the provided image is of a white switch while this product is "light almond". "Light almond" is what I would describe as "Cream" and is much closer to white than "Ivory" is.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria L. Guth

customer_reviews.title: Product Sticker with hard-to-remove Adhesive Residue ruins the whole switch
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe what Leviton has done to a good product (5603-2W). The 3-way switches (I ordered three) came with a large sticker stuck to the face of the switch. Even after removing them carefully, they leave an ugly adhesive residue that is extremely hard to get rid off completely. I tried 70% isopropyl alcohol, but the adhesive just makes a bigger mess. Does not come off with vinegar. Shame on Amazon for not recalling something like this and shame on Leviton for being an irresponsible manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: RUMMY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I was looking for and in great shape when it arrived. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great 3-way paddle switch, but not a "quiet switch"
customer_reviews.text: Needed this 3-way switch to control a hall light that was controlled by 2 switches (one at each end of the hall). Not sure what the "quiet switch" designation is for, as the switch still makes a loud click when activated and deactivated. Be careful about putting this next to switches from different manufacturers as the white will never be the same shade- luckily, this was going next to other Leviton Decora single pole switches in my home.
customer_reviews.author: boulevard_rider

customer_reviews.title: Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Seller placed an inventory label across the entire switch leaving a residue that seems to be impossible to remove. Every time you switch on and off, switch is sticky to the touch. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Linton

customer_reviews.title: They are still putting an adhesive sticker on the rocker panel that is nearly impossible to remove.  Sheer genius...
customer_reviews.text: They are still putting an adhesive sticker on the rocker panel that is nearly impossible to remove. Sheer genius...
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Leviton 5603-2E 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it's exactly what you'd expect. Typical install and function. A little over-priced in my opinion considering it's simply a black version of what you can buy at HD in white for $1.68.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Someone went crazy with the crazy glue
customer_reviews.text: Speaking this switch works just as promised. But someone in the packing process decided to smack her adhesive sticker right on switch I got this two weeks ago and I am still working on removing the glue
customer_reviews.author: Jose C Merino

product_meta.title: Leviton 5603-2W 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora Rocker 3-Way AC Quiet Switch, Residential Grade, Grounding, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:1 PackLeviton 5603-2W 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora Rocker 3-Way AC Quiet Switch, Residential Grade, Grounding, White

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Featuring a look and feel that qualify them as modern classics, Decora (R) brand designer Rocker Switches add so much at a modest cost that no home should be without them. Their sleek simplicity and smooth, quiet operation stem from quality materials fitted to tight tolerances and finished with great care, ensuring years of trouble-free service. Easy to wire, they work with tungsten, fluorescent and resistive loads. Legendary Decora® Designer Rocker Switches come in a variety of colors to harmonize with any décor. Their sturdy construction and dependable performance are everything you'd expect from the pre-eminent switch maker. 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora Rocker 3-Way AC Quiet Switch, Residential Grade, Grounding, White. Decora is a registered trademark of Leviton Mfg. Co., Inc.
feature_bullets: Switch frame shields against dust and fits in wallplate to prevent rocker binding
Terminal screws accept up to No. 12 AGW and Quickwire push-in terminals accept No. 14 AWG solid copper wire only
Sturdy construction for long service life
Full-rated current capacity with tungsten, fluorescent or resistive loads. Motor capacity is 80% of switch rating
